publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6836Murdo Fraser:Bruce Festival 2010—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Bruce Festival 2010, which will take place in Dunfermline from 19 to 29 August 2010 to celebrate the life of Robert the Bruce; notes the full programme of events in Dunfermline during the festival, which attracts thousands of people to the historic city; recognises that Dunfermline was an ancient capital of Scotland and a home of Scottish royalty from the 11th to the early 15th centuries and that Dunfermline Abbey is Robert the Bruce’s resting place, and wishes the Bruce Festival continued success throughout the years.

S3M-6836 Bruce Festival 2010 (lodged on 19 August 2010) Elaine Smith*, Willie Coffey*, Bob Doris*, Bill Aitken*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie Hepburn*, Ted Brocklebank*
